Bibliography

accidental

others, such in general as spelling, punctuation, word-division, and the like, affecting mainly its formal presentation, which may be regarded as the accidents, or as I shall call them ‘accidentals’, of the text.

(Greg 1950) 21

contributed by wout – last updated on 19-01-2015, by wout.

Accidentals. Elements of verbal text such as spelling or marks of punctuation which affect primarily the text’s formal presentation.

(missing reference) 269

contributed by wout – last updated on 19-01-2015, by wout.
